name: Karen Hoehn
goal: Helping nonprofit organizations, foundations and international agencies improve health and reduce poverty worldwide through public policy research, evaluation and advocacy and through resource mobilization.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: I follow EU institution and national EU member state policies that affect health, education, climate, development cooperation, humanitarian assistance, research and innovation worldwide.
